description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: File Upload vulnerability in lepton v.7.1.0 allows a remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code via uploading a crafted PHP file to the save.php and config.php component.

La vulnerabilidad de carga de archivos en lepton v.7.1.0 permite a atacantes remotos autenticados ejecutar código arbitrario cargando un archivo PHP manipulado en los componentes save.php y config.php.
